linkLicence.title: Link Licence to User's Account
service.title: Link Licence to User's Account
service.description.title: Service Description
service.description: Through this service, you can link an economic licence to a user's account online.
service.startLogin.description: Link DED licence to your existing account here, by clicking on Start.
requiredDocument.title: Required Documents
service.steps.title: Process
service.steps.description.findLicence: Enter the details of the licence you would like to link.
service.steps.description.uploadDocument: Upload the required documents to proceed with the application
service.steps.description.getDEDApproval: Submit the application for approval to the Department of Economic Development
linkLicence.findLicence.description: Please enter the licence number you wish to link. Once you have selected the correct licence, proceed by linking it to your account.
linkLicence.findLicence.search.label: SEARCH BY*
findLicence.table.title: Licence Details
getDEDApproval.success.title: Your licence has been successfully linked
getDEDApproval.success.description: Your licence has been successfully linked to the account. You will be notified at your registered email and through a SMS on your registered mobile number.
getDEDApproval.info.title: Your application approval is in progress
getDEDApproval.info.description: Your application is currently being assessed by the Department of Economic Development. You will be notified on the status of the application at your registered email and through a SMS on your registered mobile number.
getDEDApproval.inProgress.title: Your application approval is in progress
getDEDApproval.inProgress.description: Your application is currently being assessed by the Department of Economic Development. You will be notified on the status of the application at your registered email and through a SMS on your registered mobile number.
linkLicence.success.redirect.title: Other actions
findLicence.table.details.alert: There was an issue loading the data. Kindly refresh the page.
errorPage.title: Something Went Wrong
errorPage.text: An error occured while trying to complete your request. Please try again later.

linkLicence.200.response: Your Application Approval is in Progress
